title: Drawing, "Drawing:  Sketches made near Guaranda, Ecuador", June 10, 1857
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on cream-colored paper
markings: Stamped in ink, at lower left: Lugt 457c
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with numbers throughout; again, at upper right:  2- Warm [?] 3- green / 4- Black 5- soft brown, little [white?] / 6- Light brown; again, at center: water; and again at lower right:  Near Guanojo / Near Guaranda  June 10th /57
description: Wide horizontal view of a mountain range with a snowcapped peak in the left background and a frozen pond [?] in the foreground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Drawing:  Sketches made near Guaranda, Ecuador", June 10, 1857.
June 10, 1857. Graphite, brush and white gouache on cream-colored paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-737-b.
